name: VR Japan Tour (HD)
description:
The verdant wilderness that can't be seen at a glance allows you to gallop, the stream surrounded by bamboo forests is hidden in the deep mountain with erratic rocks and flows; the sun shines on the snow-capped mountains, and the shrine is brighter under the shining of the white snow. Waiting for the arrival of the morning in the middle of the winding mountain road; the fully armed samurai Yokoto stands in front of you, maintaining the last glory of the shogunate period, but the muskets placed side by side are telling the helplessness of the new era; The traditional Japanese-style streets will take you away from the busy life for a while.
In this VR world, not only the natural scenery is displayed in front of the players, but also the unique scenes are used to build the players in a Japanese environment.

Instructions:
The trigger of the right handle controls the transmission, press the touchpad to control the rotation
The menu button on the left handle opens/closes the menu, the trigger button selects the scene
